sourcesContent:
import React,{Fragment, useState} from 'react' import PropTypes from 'prop-types' import {connect} from 'react-redux' import {Link, withRouter} from 'react-router-dom' import { createUserProfile} from '../../actions/profileAction' const CreateProfile = ({ createUserProfile, history }) =>{ const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ company:"", website:"", location:"", bio:"", status:"", githubusername:"", skills:"", youtube:"", facebook:"", instagram:"", twitter:"", linkedin:"", }) const [displaySocialMedia, toggleSocialMedia] = useState(false) const { company, website, location, bio, status, githubusername, skills, youtube, facebook, instagram, twitter, linkedin} = formData const onChange = e => { setFormData({ ...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value}) } const onSubmit = e => { e.preventDefault() createUserProfile(formData, history) } return (

Create Your Profile

Let's get some information to make your profile stand out

* = required field
onSubmit(e)}>
Give us an idea of where you are at in your career
onChange(e)} value={company}/> Could be your own company or one you work for
onChange(e)} value={website}/> Could be your own or a company website
onChange(e)} value={location}/> City & state suggested (eg. Boston, MA)
onChange(e)} value={skills}/> Please use comma separated values (eg. HTML,CSS,JavaScript,PHP)
onChange(e)} value={githubusername}/> If you want your latest repos and a Github link, include your username
Tell us a little about yourself
Optional
{displaySocialMedia &&
onChange(e)} value={twitter}/>
onChange(e)} value={facebook}/>
onChange(e)} value={youtube}/>
onChange(e)} value={linkedin}/>
onChange(e)} value={instagram}/>
} {' '} Go Back
) } CreateProfile.propTypes = { createUserProfile:PropTypes.func.isRequired, } export default connect(null, {createUserProfile})( withRouter(CreateProfile))
